Lucas's dreams are to give the schooling that he didn't have to his children, in addition to having a home worthy of giving better stability to his family.

loans.use: to buy pasture livestock that at the end of one year have positive results

loans.name: Rokh Code Sarr's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 04 membres fait partie du banc villageois qui a été créé le 04 juin 2011. Il est composé de membres qui habitent le même village et les villages voisins. Les membres entretiennent une très bonne cohésion sociale. Ces membres s'activent dans le petit commerce. 
Seynabou, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est âgée de 48 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 08 enfants dont 02 garçons. Elle fait comme activité principale le commerce. Elle s'approvisionne en niébé, bissap et mil dans les marchés hebdomadaires et revend ses produits dans la capitale.
Elle achète 70 Kg de niébé à 250 F le Kg, 10 bassines de bissap à 3000 F la bassine, 200 Kg de mil à 275 F le Kg. Elle paie le transport à 6500 F. Elle revend le Kg de niébé à 400 F, de bissap à 6000 F et le Kg de mil à 300 F.
Avec les bénéfices, elle renforce son activité et son épargne, paie ses intérêts. Améliore les conditions de vie de la famille en achetant des chaussures, des habits, des boubous pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group of four members is part of a Banc Villageois that was created on June 4, 2011. It consists of women who live in the same village and surrounding areas. They share a very good social bond, and they make a living through small trade activities. 


Seynabou, age 48, is the member standing on the right and raising her hand in the group photo. She is married with eight children, two of them boys. To run her commercial activity, she buys her stocks of niébé, bissap and millet at the weekly markets for resale in the capital. 


She will buy 70 kg of niébé at 250 F per kg, 10 tubs of bissap at 300 F each, and 200 kg of millet at 3275 F per kg. She will also pay 6500 F for transportation. She will charge 400 F per kg of niébé, 6000 F for the bissap, and 300 F per kg of millet.   


She will use her profits to strengthen her activity, bolster her savings, and pay her interests. She will also improve her family’s living conditions by purchasing footwear, clothing, and boubous for the children.

loans.use: to buy niébé, bissap and millet for resale.

loans.name: Milagro Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MILAGRO” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Celina es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de papas fritas, venta de comida, venta de guantes, venta de mantas, venta de comida, tienda de barrio, servicio de té.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Celina es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un amiga que es clienta de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su familia, que comercializaba el mismo producto, con el pasar del tiempo decide emprender un negocio independiente. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de su mercadería (compra papa por mayor) que lo adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto, posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The community group "Milagro" will start its first cycle In Pro Mujer, as part of the Santiago II Regional Center. It consists of eight members and is governed by a board of directors in which Celina is the president. The businesses of the members of the community group are varied and include: selling french fries, selling food, selling gloves, selling blankets, selling food, a neighborhood store, and tea service.

The loan they will take will benefit small business owners like Celina, she says that this is her first time with Pro Mujer, having joined the group through the invitation of a friend that's a customer of the institution. Currently she has a food selling business; she states that she learned this business from her family, which sold the same product, and with the passage of time she decided to set up an independent business. 

The loan she's taking now is to increase her merchandise (she buys wholesale) which she'll acquire from wholesalers in the city of El Alto. After making the products she will sell them in her commercial site. This work allows her to generate income to support her family because she's in a common-law marriage and has a son.

When asked what does she like about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the training offered by the institution.

loans.use: To purchase potatoes wholesale.

loans.name: Pedro Rafael

texts.es:
El señor Pedro es habitante de la ciudad de chinandega es casado tiene 2 hijos a su cargo es trabajador de la alcaldia de chinandega desde hace 11 años se desempeña como operador de limpieza en las calles de la ciudad el inicia un dia de trabajo desde 6 am  a las 12 pm estos horarios son rotativos.


el señor pedro es un hombre sencillo, humilde que trabaja fuertemente para el sustento de su familia el solicito financiamiento para comprar laminas de zinc para mejor el techo de su casa.
texts.en:
Pedro lives in the city of Chinandega. He is married and has two dependent children. Pedro has worked for the Mayor’s office in Chinandega for the last 11 years as a technician cleaning the streets of the city. He begins his work day at 6 am and can work until 12 pm. He has a rotating schedule for his work. 

Pedro is a simple, humble man who works very hard to sustain his family. He is asking for this loan to buy sheets of zinc to improve the roof of his house.

loans.use: to buy sheets of zinc to improve the roof of his house.

loans.name: Oscar Isaias

texts.es: Oscar de 29 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos de 1 y 5 años de edad. Él es un hombre que todos los días se esfuerza por dar lo mejor de él en su trabajo de transportista, gracias a ello logra sostener la economía de su hogar. Oscar siempre busca la manera de dar lo mejor a su familia por lo que desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda, ya que este tiene algunas filtraciones lo que ha provocado que sus pertenencias se deterioren y es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda lo antes posible y así evitar el deterioro de sus pertenencias.
texts.en: Oscar is 29 years old and lives with his life companion and his two children aged 1 and 5 years old. He is a person who makes an effort every day to give his best in his work as a driver. Thanks to this work he manages to sustain the family economy. Oscar always looks for the way to provide the best for his family. So he wants to fix the roof which has water entering through it  which is damaging his possessions. So he has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in galvanized laminate, wood and nails to replace the roof of his house as soon as possible and avoid damaging his belongings.

loans.use: to invest in galvanized laminate, wood and nails to replace the roof of his house.

loans.name: Rosa Angelica

texts.es:
Rosa Angelica de estado conviviente, reside en casa propia desde hace más de 3 años junto a su conyugue e hijo, ella es natural de la zona. La comunidad se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería comercio de todo tipo y crianza de ganado. Dicha comunidad está ubciada en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Rosa Angelica es a la venta de comida, bebidas gaseosas y chichas, además de la crianza y venta de aves de corral(pavos y patos) desde hace más de 5 ya que era ayudante de su madre, clienta cuenta con apoyo en los ingresos de su conyugue el cual trabaja en la pesca de conchas de abanico en la cuidad de paita. Y fabricador de ladrillo. Destino del crédito sera para la construcción de una pared en su casa. Lo que le dará una mayor seguridad y comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Angelica is in a common-law relationship. She has been living in her own home along with her partner and child for more than three years. Her community is known for agriculture, ranching, trade of all types, and raising livestock. It is located in the District and Province of Morropón, which is in the region of Piura on the northern coast of Peru.

Rosa Angelica has a business that involves selling food, beverages, sodas, and “chicha” (a traditional beverage made from corn). She has also been raising poultry (turkeys and ducks) for more than five years since she was her mother’s assistant. Her partner helps out with the income he earns from his work as a scallop fisherman in the city of Paita. He also works at a brickyard.

This loan will be used to build a wall in her house. This will provide greater security and comfort for her family.

loans.use: to build a wall in her house.

loans.name: Jorge Alfredo

texts.es:
Jorge de 32 años de edad, está acompañado y tiene dos hijos, dos de ellos estudian. 

Jorge es agricultor, tiene 10 años de experiencia trabajando, aprendió de su padre que también era agricultor y Jorge lo acompañaba en las labores agrícolas desde muy pequeño.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar fertilizantes y plaguicidas, actualmente tiene sembrado maíz y necesita realizar la aplicación de los respectivos agroquímicos para procurar una buena cosecha.

Jorge espera ampliar su área de siembra, ya que por falta de dinero solo  siembra una parte del terreno que le heredo su papá, pero con ayuda de la institución espera utilizar todo el terreno para sacarle mejor provecho.
texts.en:
Jorge, 32, has a partner and two children. Two of them are studying.

Jorge is a farmer. He has 10 years of work experience. He learned from his father who was also a farmer. Jorge accompanied his father to attend to agricultural duties since he was very small.

The loan will be used to buy fertilizer and pesticide. He currently has corn planted and needs to apply the respective agro-chemicals to it in order to ensure a good harvest.

Jorge hopes to expand his planting area. Due to lack of money he only sows part of the land that he inherited from his father, but with the help of the institution he hopes to use all of the land to get more out of it.

loans.use: to buy fertlizer and pesticide

loans.name: Jaquilyn

texts.en:
Jaquilyn is 36 years old with three children who are in school, Jaquilyn works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. Jaquilyn has been in this business for three years.

In the future, Jaquilyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Phebe

texts.en:
Phebe is 43 years old and married with seven children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of household goods to sell such as canned goods, eggs, soap, shampoo, etc.

Phebe has been in this business for eight years.

In the future, Phebe would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of household goods to sell such as canned goods, eggs, soap, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
As a single parent of three children, Susan works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Susan is borrowing PHP 24,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Susan has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Luz Martha

texts.es:
Luz, una mujer de 45 años de edad que dio toda su vida en beneficio de su familia ayudándola a salir adelante y superando juntos las adversidades que se les han presentado en la vida, gracias a una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo, paciencia y sacrificio logro montar, ha generado los ingresos para el sostenimiento de la familia y buscando ser la mejor empresa familiar del sector. 

Quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de insumos que le permitan aumentar su inventario de venta ofertando productos que los clientes le ha pedido como ciertas marcas de productos de la canasta familiar, y cree que este crédito será la gran oportunidad para despegar y consolidarse como la tienda más solicitada en el barrio.
texts.en:
Luz is 45 years old and has given her whole life helping her family get ahead and together overcome adversities that came their way in life. Thanks to a store, that with great effort, patience, and sacrifice she was able to open, she has generated the income needed to support her family and she is looking to be the best family business in that business sector.

She seeks a loan to buy items that will enable her to increase the inventory she has to sell, offering products to her customers that they have asked her for such as certain brands. She believes that this loan will be a great opportunity to make her store the most sought out in the neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy grocery products to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her son's tuition fee

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
La socia Maria Teresa  se dedica al negocio de cafetin, la socia vende tortas, pasteles y cafes, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de cafetin.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tortas y pasteles.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Maria Teresa has a cafe business. She sells cakes, pastries and coffee. She has had this business for many years already, and it is going well. Her dream is to grow her cafe business. She is requesting a loan to buy cakes and pastries. The member is happy with the loan, and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cakes and pastries.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena, 41, is a resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. She is married to Nathanael and has four children. One is already working, one is in college, one is in high school, and the youngest is still in preparatory level. She works with diligence to support her family’s household needs and her children’s education.

Rowena has operated a watch-repair service and shop for twenty years now. Her shop offers repair and check-up of all types of watches. She now also sells different types and brands of watches. Her shop is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 2,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales and service every day. Aside from her watch repair shop, she also sells made-to-order native delicacies.

To continue operations of her business she is requesting a Pho 10,000 (PHP) to buy more ladies and men's watches, assorted lens, frames and bracelets for her service shop. She thanks God and you in advance for the financial help supplies for his watch repair shop.

Rowena believes her business is growing, and she will be able to give her children the best education. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for batteries, bracelets, frames, and watches.

loans.name: Jordana

texts.es:
La socia Jordana se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa deportiva, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar  polos, chompas, polos y blusas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jordana sells athletic wear. She sells pants, shirts and polos. 

She has been in this line of business for several years and is very successful.

Her dream is to own a store. 

Jordana is requesting a loan to buy polos, sweaters and blouses. 

She is happy with the loan and is committed to meeting the monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy shoes, polos, sweaters and blouses.

loans.name: Leidys

texts.es: Leidys de 33 años de edad es la propietaria de una farmacia ubicada a l suroccidente de la ciudad., donde habita con su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 11 a 17 años. Desde el año 2012, inició su negocio después que su esposo le propuso abrir un negocio similar a la actividad que él conocía, pues trabaja en una droguería, donde ha aprendido su manejo administrativo. Con el fin de generar ingresos Leidys decidió emprender su propia aventura comercializando productos farmacéuticos directamente en un local ubicado donde habita. Ella trabaja todos los días, desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche y vende de contado a su clientela conformada principalmente por su vecindad. Sus compras las realiza a mayoristas especializados en droguerías, con el fin de lograr seguridad en su compra y buenos precios.  Su meta más adelante es ampliar sus ventas, para poder comprar su vivienda, aunque su mayor desafío sea la fidelización de su clientela, con precios competitivos y un magnifico servicio al cliente. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará medicinas variedades y juguetería, con el firme propósito de aprovechar la temporada de fin de año y lograr incrementar sus ventas, como es su costumbre en esta magnífica época comercial.
texts.en:
Leidys, 33, owns a pharmacy in the southwest part of the city where she lives with her spouse and her three children, ages 11 through 17.

She started her business in 2012 after her husband suggested she open a business similar to the work he was familiar with, because he worked in a drug store where he learned administrative management.  To earn her own income, Leidys decided to start her own business venture selling pharmaceutical products directly in a space located in her home.  She works every day from 7 in the morning until 7 at night.  She sells in cash to her customers, who are mainly from the neighborhood.  She buys products from wholesalers who specialize in drug stores so she has security in her purchases and good prices.

Leidys's long-term goal is to expand her sales so she can buy her house.  Her biggest challenge, however, is customer loyalty, with competitive prices and excellent customer service.

Leidys is currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She's going to buy medicine, accessories, and toys.  She's determined to make the most of the end-of-year season and increase her sales, as is customary during this wonderful shopping season.

loans.use: to buy medicine, accessories, and toys

loans.name: Lyneth

texts.en:
Lyneth works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Lyneth has been in this business for four years now.

In the future, Lyneth would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Satenik

texts.en:
Satenik, a farmer from Bagravan village in the Shirak region, lives with her two sons and retired mother-in-law.

Satenik's husband emigrated to a neighbouring country with the hopes of finding a well-paid job. He is the main breadwinner of the family. His salary, however, is not enough to meet the family's needs. To help her husband in earning a living for the family, Satenik is engaged in cattle breeding, sheep breeding, and aviculture.
 
To continue running her agribusiness in a sustainable way, Satenik needs to make some investments, and so has requested a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and forage for feeding the livestock. 

Satenik and her family rely on the goodwill of the lenders and will highly appreciate their support in this matter.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, seeds, and forage for feeding the livestock.

loans.name: Víctor David

texts.es:
Víctor tiene 24 años de edad,  estudio hasta segundo grado. Está acompañado y actualmente trabaja en una maquila. Su esposa solo se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar, Víctor trabaja en la maquila desde hace 6 años, en la cual se dedica a elaborar toda clase de vestimenta.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar laminas, clavos, madera, para su pequeña casa.  Él desea tener la posibilidad de tener un hogar más seguro para él y su esposa ya que en la temporada de invierno ha llegado a inundarse su hogar por la vulnerabilidad de su hogar.

A futuro Víctor desea tener sus hijos y brindarles lo mejor día con día.
texts.en:
Víctor is 24 years old and went as far as second grade.. He is married and currently works in a garment factory. His wife stays home and looks after the household.

Victor has been working at the factory for six years, where he makes every kind of clothing. He will use the loan to buy some materials for repairing their small home: sheet metal roofing, nails and wood.  He wants to be able to have a safer home for him and his wife, as during the winter season their home has suffered from flooding due to the vulnerability of their house structure. 

Someday Victor wishes to have children and to offer them the best, day by day.

loans.use: to buy some materials for repairing his small home: sheet metal roofing, nails and wood

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy inputs for smelting

loans.name: Ramón Omar

texts.es:
Ramón de 27 años de edad,  estudio hasta 8ª grado, esta acompañado y su pareja se dedica a vender frutas en una escuela, no tienen hijos ellos viven en casa de sus padres.

Ramón es empleado en una alcaldía en el área de medio ambiente desde hace 3 años. Antes de esto trabajo en barcos pesqueros, durante 5 años y también en estructuras metálicas; tiene que trasladarse a 3 kilómetros en bicicleta para  llegar hasta su trabajo, su horario es de 8:00 am a 4:00 pm y regresa a su casa a ayudar a su esposa en los quehaceres.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar bloque, cemento, arena para construir una habitación a su vivienda. 

Los sueños de Ramón son tener un mejor trabajo, tener una casa propia porque vive con sus padres, sabe que con la ayuda de Dios y los prestamos lo hara posible.
texts.en:
Ramón is 27 years old and completed an 8th grade education. He is married and his wife sells fruits at a school. They don't have children, and live in their parent's home. Ramón has worked for the local government in the environmental services area for 3 years. Prior to this work, he worked for five years on fishing boats and also in metallurgy. He travels by bike for 3 kilometers to arrive at work, and he works from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM, returning to his home to help his wife with the household chores.

The loan he seeks is to buy blocks, cement, and sand to build a room onto his home. Ramón dreams of having a better job and of having his own house because he lives with his parents. He knows that with God's help and the loans it will be possible.

loans.use: to buy blocks, cement and sand to build a room on his home.

loans.name: Malek

texts.en:
Malek has a passion for cooking and an even bigger passion for healthy cooking. His specialty is baked chicken, but he calls it “fried.” He loves the crunch and the savory taste of each bite of his baked “fried” chicken. Malek spent years trying to find the perfect recipe that wouldn’t have such a huge impact on the waistline. His chicken seasoning doesn’t just capture the taste of fried chicken, but serves as a heathier alternative to the real thing. 

“Fried chicken is delicious, but you also have to consider the health factors in consuming it,” Malek said. “You can still enjoy your favorite foods, because there is always a healthier way to prepare them.”

For the last seven years, Malek has worked on his signature chicken recipe. A little over a year ago, Malek started his company, Ames Fried Chicken, in Houston, Texas. His business is packaging and preparing fried chicken seasoning without using butter, oil, eggs or milk. He got his start by packaging his seasonings and selling them to various restaurants. Today, Malek is baking up his own chicken. 

“My chicken is a bit different,” Malek said. “It has all the great taste of regular fried chicken, but far less grease.”

Malek came to Accion Texas Inc. to help fund the marketing for his business. In the future, he plans to hire more employees. Ultimately, he wants his business to grow into a franchise. 

“It’s been a little over a year and I’ve made so much progress with my business,” Malek said. “I am selling more than just chicken—I’m feeding people my dreams every day.”

loans.use: to pay for marketing materials for his business to grow his business.

loans.name: Maria Elcy

texts.es:
Gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre María puede darse el lujo de ser una gran cocinera y ha usado esas capacidades para crear una micro-empresa que distribuye alimentos hace aproximadamente 7 años y que busca a través de un crédito comprar un Horno que necesita urgentemente para mejorar su oferta y su empresa.
Su sueño es tener más productos y poder mejorar su empresa, tener un local comercial y seguir siendo un apoyo para su hija de 9 años y para su familia.
texts.en: Thanks to her mother's teachings, Maria has the pleasure of being a great cook and has used her talents to create a small business distributing food. She has had the business approximately 7 years and she seeks a loan to buy an oven that she urgently needs to improve her goods and her business. Her dream is to have more products and be able to improve her business, have a commercial location, and continue being a support to her 9 year old daughter and her family.

loans.use: to buy an oven to sell baked goods.

loans.name: Norie

texts.en:
Norie, a 46-year-old mother of four children ranging in age from 22 to eight, lives with her family in Carles, Ilo-ilo. She has been engaged in fishing.for almost 20 years, selling her catch to members of her local community.  Her husband works as a carpenter. 

Norie is requesting a loan of PhP 25,000 in order to buy a pump boat engine. This will help her to increase her catch. In the future, she would like to expand her fishing business enough to support the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy a pump boat engine

loans.name: Haydee

texts.en:
Haydee is married with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Haydee is 42 years old and has four children who are in school.

Haydee has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials like fishing net, gasoline, wood, etc.

Haydee has been in this business for seven years. In the future, Haydee would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like fishing net, gasoline, and wood

loans.name: Ivan De Jesus

texts.es:
Iván es un hombre ya muy veterano de 72 años, carismático y amable que ha sabido ganarse el corazón de sus vecinos los cuales le compran, Iván tiene una tienda donde oferta productos de la canasta familiar  es el único negocio que le da entrada de dinero pues toda la vida fue independiente y no cuenta ni con una pensión, no cuenta con pareja ni hijos así que depende exclusivamente de su negocio y por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido de canasta familiar pues necesita mantener surtido su negocio para poder comer. 
Su sueño es seguir generando ventas y tener una vejez tranquila sin preocupaciones económicas y lo más importante envejecer feliz.
texts.en:
Ivan is an aged man of 72 years, charismatic and kind, who has won over the hearts of his neighbors who buy from him. Ivan has a store where he offers basic grocery necessities. It is the only business that brings him in money since he was independent all of his life and does not have a pension. He does not have a partner nor children thus he depends exclusively on his business. It is for this that he is requesting a loan to restock basic necessities since he needs to keep his business restocked in order to eat. 

His dream is to continue generating sales and to have a calm old age without financial worries and, most importantly, to age happily.

loans.use: to restock basic grocery necessities.

loans.name: Krishne

texts.en:
Krishne is a very hardworking man; that's why he could pay his loan early on time. He thanks the Kiva lenders once again for their help. 

With the profit from his last loan, he paid for his children’s tuition. He wants to continue rice cultivation, so he can save more for his family.

loans.use: to purchase diesel and fertilizers.

loans.name: Maria Dora

texts.es:
Maria, es una joven mujer que desde hace varios años se ha dedicado a diversas actividades laborales.

Hoy en día se encuentra dedicada a la venta de mercancía y preparación de alimentos por encargo.

La titular se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, amable, con visión y muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por esta razón que se anima a solicitar un crédito para invertirlo en comprar mercancía como ropa y zapatos con el fin de darle un impulso al negocio, que logre atraer más clientes para ofrecerles una variedad de productos que satisfagan las necesidades y gustos de todos los clientes, de esta manera logrará obtener más ingresos para continuar aportando a la economía de su hogar y ahorrar para montar un local comercial y así tendrá un futuro más próspero, donde podrá mejorar notoriamente su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is a young woman who has worked in various settings over the past several years. Currently she works selling goods and preparing food made to order.

She is characterized as a friendly and entrepreneurial woman with a vision and a strong desire to get ahead. Because of this, she is inspired to request a loan to invest in the purchase of goods such as clothing and shoes to give her business a boost. This will bring in more customers to whom she offers a variety of products that satisfy the needs and tastes of everyone. In this way she will be able to earn a higher income to continue supporting her household and save to put together a storefront. She will have a more prosperous future and be able to noticeably improve quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to purchase various goods such as clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Azizi Group

texts.en:
Grace, who is in her early 30s, is single. She has been running a genge (grocery) business for 10 years now. She works from 5 a.m. to 8 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Grace's 20th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to keep increasing the items in her genge. She is doing fine. She used the profit to take care of herself and covered household expenses.  

She will use this loan to buy the out-of-stock items in her genge. She dreams of owning a retail food shop.

Grace will share this loan with her loan group, "Azizi," which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy the out-of-stock items in her genge (grocery business).

loans.name: Sreineat

texts.en: Sreineat is a 19-year-old student from Kampong Speu Province of Cambodia and she is taking an English literature major at university. To help cover her study expenses, she has been employed as a shop assistant in a supermarket since 2013 earning $4 per day. Because of a lack of finances, Sreineat would like to request a loan to pay for her tuition fees. This loan will help her to pursue a bachelor’s degree. In the future, she hopes to have her own business and have a proper house.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition fees

loans.name: Juntos Triunfaremos En Cocachacra Group

texts.es: El grupo “JUNTOS TRIUNFAREMOS EN COCACHACRA” está conformado por socios dedicados al comercio minorista. Vanessa tiene  su restaurant en la carretera central de su localidad teniendo como principales  clientes a los transportistas y los habitantes de su localidad. En crédito lo invertirá en la implementación de una bodega y jugueria para obtener mejores ganancias. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Vanessa es la primera persona sentada del lado derecho.
texts.en: The “JUNTOS TRIUNFAREMOS EN COCACHACRA” group consists of dedicated entrepreneurs. Vanessa has a restaurant on the main road in her area so her customers are primarily people who work in transportation and the inhabitants of her area.  The loan will be used to open a store and juice bar in order to generate more profits. The group is thankful to the Kiva investors for the loan. Vanessa is the first person seated on the right side of the photo.

loans.use: to open a store and juice bar.

loans.name: Leodita

texts.en:
Leodita, 55, is a resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. She is married to Bonifacio and has one child. She manages her own household and works to provide income to meet their daily household expenses.

Leodita makes and sells native delicacies such as "puto" and "kutsinta"(sweet sticky rice cakes). These are commonly eaten for snacks and also for desserts. She sells them personally around her town, and she also accepts orders during holidays. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. 

Aside from selling native delicacies, she also has a piggery in her backyard. She earns a minimum of PHP 200 from her rice cakes every day and PHP 4,000 a month from her piggery business.

To help her continue with her business, she would like to apply for a PHP 15,000 loan, which she will use to buy raw ingredients such as sticky rice, flour, sugar, coconut milk, and also to buy a baby pig. She is positive of a good profit on her investment. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her. 

Leodita aims to have a stall of her own for her native delicacies and a stall in the market to sell fresh pork. She dreams to own a vehicle to easily transport her rice cakes and fresh meat to the town market. She prays to stay healthy and happy in their old age. 

She faithfully meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for ingredients such as flour, sugar and other ingredients needed to cook native delicacies to sell.

loans.name: Jonaviv

texts.en:
This is Jonaviv. His previous loan was a big help in his business. He was able to buy stationery. He has been in this business for years now, and it keeps on growing. 

He would like to apply for another loan, this time for Kes 50,000, to buy more stock of books and other stationery for resale. More items to sell will result in better profits. His profits from business will definitely help him to sustain his daily needs and the educational expenses of his children. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart.

loans.use: to buy more stock of books and other stationery for resale.

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marietta is 25 years old and both of her children are in school.

Marietta has a trisikad transportation business in the Philippines. Marietta requested a PHP 9000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy spare parts for her trisikad transportation business.

Marietta has been in this business for three years. In the future, Marietta would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: buy spare parts for her trisikad transportation.

loans.name: Angelmiro De Jesus

texts.es: Angelmiro es un hombre que a sus 38 años de edad está realizando un sueño el cual es ser independiente, y se nota en la sonrisa de su foto lo feliz y expectante que esta de este nuevo proyecto de vida en el cual montara una tienda y ahora pide ayuda  de un crédito el cual invertirá en productos de canasta familiar, para abrir su local comercial e iniciar unos nuevos sueños como comprar casa, mejorar la relación con su hija ya que podrá estar más cerca de ella y poder brindarle una buena calidad de vida y todo ello lo podrá lograr con la ayuda de posibles prestamista que apoyen su idea de negocio, Angelmiro antes era empleado y abandono todo por estar cerca de su hija.
texts.en: Angelmiro is a man who at 38 years of age is making his dream of being an independent business owner a reality.  One can tell by his smile in the picture that he is happy and excited about his new life project of opening a store.  He is now asking for help through a loan which he will use to purchase basic household goods so that he can open his store and work towards his other dreams like building a house, improving his relationship with his daughter since he will be able to be closer to her, and provide her with a better quality of life.  He will be able to achieve all of this with the help of the lenders who support his business idea.  Prior to this, Angelmiro was an employee but he left that in order to be closer to his daughter.

loans.use: to start his general store so that he can be closer to his daughter.  He will purchase basic family goods.

loans.name: Etaf

texts.en: Because Etaf is a conservative lady, she asked her son to take her place in the picture. Etaf is a 48-year-old married lady living with her family that consists of five members. Her husband is an ironsmith. One of her sons is a 21-year-old university student majoring in Civil Engineering, and he is in his third year. He also works as an engineer assistant. His aim is to get his Bachelor's degree so that he will be able to find a job with a better income. However, because the family has been facing financial problems recently, Etaf has applied for this loan to help her son pay his upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: To pay her son's upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Luis David

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del amor se encuentra ubicado al noroccidente de la provincia de Pichincha, este Cantón es un atractivo turístico muy visitado debido a su gran cantidad de flora y fauna silvestre es el lugar perfecto para venir a descansar, el clima es cálido húmedo lleno de gente amable y trabajadora en este Cantón vive Luis un joven trabajador de bajos recursos económicos y no puedo continuar con sus estudios ya que tienen que trabajar, como controlador de auto bus y no tiene mucho tiempo libre, es soltero vive en casa de familiares.  
Solicita este crédito para invertir en una granja de cerdos, este es un negocio muy productivo del mismo que tiene bastante conocimiento, aprendió junto con los papás a este negocio le dedicará un promedio de 4 horas por día, con esta inversión mejorará sus ingresos económicos y tendrá la oportunidad para poder continuar con sus estudios. 
Luis agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad de mejorar su calidad de vida y tener un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos, the canton of love, is located in the northwest region of the Pichincha province.  The canton is a tourist attraction that is heavily visited due to its vast amount of wild flora and fauna.  It is a perfect place to relax, with its warm and humid climate, and its kind and hardworking people.  

Luis lives in this in this canton.  He is a young worker of few means.  He was not able to continue with his studies because he had to start working as a bus driver and he no longer has much free time.  He is single and lives in his family's home.  

He is seeking a loan to invest in a pig farm.  This is a very productive business of which he knows a lot.  He learned this business with his parents.  He will dedicate about 4 hours a day to this business.  With this investment, he will improve his income and have the ability to continue with his education.  Luis is grateful for Fundación Alternative and Kiva for the support and the opportunity to improve his quality of life and have a better future.

loans.use: to launch his own business, a pig farm.

loans.name: Santander

texts.es:
Santander es un campesino, humilde y trabajador con el empuje y verraquera que distingue a los hombres y mujeres del campo.

Es un Hombre de mente emprendedora y desde muy pequeño aprendió todos los oficios del campo como cultivos y crianza de animales, tanto así que hoy en día tiene su propio cultivo de plátanos; alimentos que vende en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Turbo, Antioquia.

Este personaje tiene como propósito aumentar sus cultivos y mejorar los que actualmente tiene y es por eso que acude a la ayuda de un crédito para la compra de insumos agropecuarios como fertilizantes y la compra de semillas de plátano.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de progresar como empresario y como persona, además de aumentar sus ingresos y seguir aportando el sustento en su hogar.

Él lo único que quiere es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Santander is a farmer. He is humble and hard-working with the drive that distinguishes the men and women of the countryside. He is an enterprising man and from a young age learned the various farming jobs such as growing crops and raising animals. So today he has his own banana crop, he sells the food in the plaza municipal market in Turbo, Antioquia.

He would like to increase the number of crops and improve those he has so he is seeking a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer and banana seeds. The loan will give him the opportunity to improve as a businessman and as a person, in addition to increasing his income and being able to support his home. He only desire is to be able to improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies such as fertilizers and banana seeds.

loans.name: Wadi

texts.en:
Meet Wadi. Wadi is single and lives with his family in Majalengka, a city in West Java, which is located about 4 hours' drive from Jakarta. Wadi runs a small stall in his house which sells mobile phones, phone accessories, and mobile phone airtime for his customers.

Wadi joined Ruma about a month ago because he wanted to increase his family’s income. He feels really excited about expanding his new business in selling more mobile phone airtime credits.

As the business runs, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to provide greater access to mobile services for his community by processing airtime transactions on the weekends. In the photo, Wadi is in his small stall.  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide mobile phone services in his community

loans.name: Usman

texts.en:
Meet Usman. Usman is married, and he lives with his wife and their only child in South Bogor, a suburban area that is located about two hours drive from Jakarta, the capital city. To support his family's living, Usman runs a small stall which sells mobile phone SIM cards, phone accessories, household electrical equipment, and mobile phone airtime for his customers. 

Usman was introduced to Ruma by one of his friends and he quickly became interested in joining Ruma about a month ago because he wanted to increase his family income. He is excited about his new business, which is selling mobile phone airtime to his community. 

As the business runs, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to provide access to mobile services for his community by processing airtime transactions on the weekends. 

In the photo, Usman is in his small stall. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide mobile services in his community

loans.name: Tropia Group

texts.en:
Joseph, who is in his mid 40s, is married with four children, two of them are at school and two are still small. He has been running a grocery store for three years now. He works from 12:00 noon to 11pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be Joseph's 10th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used he previous loans to renovate on the grocery store buy repairing the floor and to put in counter chairs. He is doing great and appreciates Kiva for their support.  He used the profit to pay for the school fees and to cover household expenses. He will use this loan to buy drinks for the grocery store. He dreams of buying a plot of land.

Joseph will share this loan with his loan group "TROPIA" which consist of eleven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy drinks for the grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase a grill to make pupusas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a bundle of toys, items for the home such as kitchen items, and clothing.

loans.name: Bisnoe

texts.en:
Bisnoe thanks all his Kiva lenders for helping him realize his dreams. He paid his loan fully and on time. With the profits, he could save for his children's studies and for their futures. 

Bisnoe wants another loan of SRD 10,000 for purchasing fertilizers and pesticides for his rice production so he can save more for his children's studies.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Huruma Group

texts.en:
Joyce, who is in her early 40s, is a divorcee with two sons who are still in school. She has been a food vendor for ten years now. She works from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Joyce's sixth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to keep on increasing the food stock and has managed to pay back all her loans successfully. She is doing great with the loans and appreciates Kiva for their support. She used the profit to pay for school fees and covered household expenses. 

She will use this loan to buy food ingredients. She dreams of building her own house.

Joyce will share this loan with her loan group, "Huruma," which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loans.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients.

loans.name: Maria Liliana

texts.es:
Maria ha podido acumular grandes experiencias gratas en su vida, una de ellas es el haber podido trabajar en diferentes tiendas de abarrotes en el municipio de Chigorodo.

Es una madre amorosa y responsable y tiene muy presente el significado de la familia en su proceso productivo.

Ella siempre fue muy inquieta y con gran vocación de servicio, cualidades que la motivaron para iniciar con su propia tienda de abarrotes y hacerla muy reconocida en el sector.

Hoy en día es una mujer amable y muy emprendedora, siempre buscando alternativas para que sus clientes se sientan bien atendidos y comprando productos de calidad.

Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar pues planea aumentar su oferta de productos y desea tener un inventario mucho más grande, así podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes. 

Adicionalmente desea realizar una ampliación de su tienda y así obtener unos ingresos extra para su familia.
 
Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran distribuidora de víveres, considera que poco a poco puede lograrlo.
texts.en:
Maria has been able to gather great, enjoyable experiences in her life. One of them is to have been able to work in different grocery stores in the municipality of Chigorodo. She's a loving and responsible mother and she is very aware of the meaning of family in her productive process. She was always lively and has a great calling for service, qualities that motivated her to open her own grocery store and make it very well known in the sector. Today, she is a kind and very enterprising woman, always looking for alternatives so that her clients feel well cared for, and buying quality products. 

She asks for a loan for the purchase of a range of products of basic family needs, since she plans to increase her supply of products and she wants to have a much bigger inventory. In this way she could have the products available for her clients. 

Additionally, she wants to carry out an extension of her shop, and in this way obtain some extra income for her family. Her greatest dream is to be able to have a large distributor of supplies. She believes that little by little, she can achieve that.

loans.use: to buy a range of products of basic family needs for her store

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
Petrona es una mujer de 57 años de edad, casada, sin hijos y su negocio es la elaboración de queso.
Ella es independiente, fuerte, constante, emprendedora, responsable y trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en la localidad de ‘Batallas’ que se encuentra ubicado en cercanías al lago Titicaca, área agrícola dónde se cría ganado vacuno, ovino, se vive de la pesca y también de vegetales del lugar, como la quinua, el chuño, la haba, la papa, etc. caracterizada por el clima frío donde la luz solar golpea fuertemente la superficie.
Petrona es de tez morena, cabello negro largo trenzado, estatura mediana, su vestimenta es típica (manta, sombrero y pollera), su lengua materna es el aymara y habla español por cultura general. Su negocio es la elaboración de queso artesanal, realizando todo el proceso con la ayuda de su esposo que también trabaja la tierra en su casa que cuenta con el servicio de luz, para conseguir agua debe caminar largas distancias hasta orillas del rio. También se ocupa de la venta; ella transporta en una canasta la producción de queso obtenida hasta la zona del cementerio en una ciudad vecina a dos horas aproximadas de viaje, en ese lugar se sienta en el suelo cerca a la entrada del cementerio y abre su canasta para que en un tiempo de cuatro horas termine de vender hasta el último queso.  Este es la primera secuencia de préstamos en sus 14 años de experiencia en el negocio. Su sueño es tener un establo grande y con mucho ganado, y desea realizar la compra de dos vacas lecheras para obtener mayor cantidad de leche para la producción.
Es por esos motivos que Petrona solicita un préstamo para la compra de dos vacas lecheras y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Petrona is 57 years old, married, and does not have any children. Her business is making cheese. she is independent, strong, dependable, enterprising, responsible, and hard-working. She works in Batallas, which is located near Lake Titicaca. It is a farming area where there are cattle, fishing, and vegetables in the area such as quinoa, bean, potato, etc. This area is known for its cold weather where the sunlight strongly hits the earth's surface.

Petrona has a dark complexion, long black hair in braids, medium height, and dresses traditionally (hat, shirt, skirt). Her mother language is Aymara and she also speaks Spanish. Her business is making artisan cheese, doing the whole process with the help of her husband who also works the land. Their house has electrical service, and to conserve water they have to walk a long distance to the banks of the river. She also sells her cheese, transporting it in a basket to the neighboring city two hours away. There she sits on the ground at the entrance to the cemetery and opens her basket so that in four short hours she sells all her cheese.

This is the first series of loans in her 14 years in business. Her dream is to have a large stable with many head of cattle. With the loan she wants to buy two milk cows to obtain a larger quantity of milk for her cheese production. For this reason Petrona seeks a loan to buy two milk cows and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy two milk cows and improve her quality of life.

loans.name: Stellah

texts.en:
Stellah is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past six years, she has operated a retail shop business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. Her potential customers are neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Stellah dreams of establishing a wholesale business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting of 50,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour and beans. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour and beans

loans.name: Astrie

texts.en:
Astrie once again is very happy with all the help she gets from all the Kiva lenders. She thanks you all for helping her with her rice cultivation. With the profits of the last loan, she renovated (painted) her house. 

She again wants help for buying fertilizers and pesticides for her rice production so she can make more profits and save for her family's future.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Rosas Del Paraiso Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSAS DEL PARAISO” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Victoria es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de pan, venta de salchipapas, servicio de transporte, venta de dulces, venta de pollos, servicio de limpieza.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Victoria es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitar a su domicilio. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de servicio de limpieza; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de un trabajo anterior, donde trabajada de empleada, con un poco de ahorros decide abrir su negocio independiente. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de material de limpieza por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo implementará en su espacio de trabajo. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el consultorio, las capacitaciones y el ahorro que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen se observa la ausencia de una de las clientas, la misma se encuentra en el consultorio médico.
texts.en:
The “ROSAS DEL PARAISO” communal bank will begin its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Senkata Centro Focal. It consists of 8 members and is directed by an executive board where Victoria is the president. The members of the communal bank have various businesses: selling bread, selling food, transportation, selling sweets, selling chickens, and cleaning service.

The loan will benefit their small businesses where Victoria is a member. She shares that this is the first time joining Pro Mujer, joining at the invitation of a representative that visited her at her home. Today Victoria has a cleaning business. She learned this trade from a previous job, where she worked as an employee. With her few savings she decided to open her own business.

The loan is to increase capital to buy cleaning supplies at wholesale from the various vendors in La Paz city and then will use them in her place of work. This work permits her to generate income to support her family, as she is single with three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health services, the educational offerings, and the savings that the institution offers. In the photo one of the group members is missing as she was at the health clinic.

loans.use: to buy cleaning supplies.

loans.name: Hendry Nelson

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos más conocido como  Cantón del amor lleno de gente amable y trabajadora, es un lugar muy turístico, por las diversas cascadas y hosterías y el maravilloso clima, aquí encontramos la cascada del amor al cual se puede llegar muy rápido por el maravilloso teleférico que tenemos en este Cantón, en este Cantón vive y trabaja el señor Hendry un hombre luchador de bajos recursos económicos y tuvo que trabajar desde temprana edad y no pudo continuar con sus estudios solo tiene primaria, es padre soltero tiene una hija de 9  años por la que día con día lucha y se supera para darle un mejor futuro, trabaja como guardia de seguridad
Solicita este crédito para emprender en una granja de cerdos un negocio rentable de poco riesgo, aprendió de esta actividad por iniciativa propia, al mismo le dedicara un promedio de 4 horas por día, con esta inversión mejorara sus ingresos económicos y su calidad de vida, podrá ofrecer un mejor futuro a su hija, el señor Hendry agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos, better known as the canton of love, full of nice and hardworking people, is a popular tourist attraction for the diverse 
waterfalls and hostels, and the marvelous weather. Here we find the waterfall of love, to which you can arrive very quickly by the marvellous cable car that we have in this canon. In this canton lives and works Hendry, a determined man of few economic resources. He had to work from a very early age and could not continue with his studies; he only attended primary school. He is a single father; he has a nine-year-old daughter for whom he works day after day, and he betters himself to give her a better future. He works as a security guard.

He asks for this loan to launch a pig farm, a profitable, low-risk business. He learned this job through his own initiative, at the same time that he worked an average of four hours a day. With this investment he would improve his income and his quality of life. He will be able to offer a better future to his daughter. Hendry thanks the Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support and the provided opportunity.

loans.use: to launch his business of a pig farm

loans.name: Angelica María

texts.es:
Angélica es una joven muy emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y progresar.

Desde hace 2 años se viene dedicando a la venta de productos por catalogo como ropa, accesorios, artículos de belleza y elementos para el hogar, estos productos los vende principalmente a amigos, vecinos y familiares que conocen a Angélica y quieren que también progrese en su actividad.

Desde muy niña sintió gran afinidad con el comercio y las ventas, por lo que hoy en día tiene grandes habilidades en este campo gracias a su simpatía y excelente calidad de servicio.

Solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de productos de belleza y ropa para aumentar su inventario y mejorar sus ventas, obteniendo así unos buenos ingresos para colaborar con los gastos de su hogar.

Tiene la esperanza de poder salir adelante gracias al apoyo de las personas de buen corazón que apoyan este tipo de proyectos.
texts.en:
Angélica is an enterprising young woman with the drive to get ahead and be successful. 2 years ago she began selling products by catalog such as clothing, accessories, beauty products, and items for the home. She sells these products primarily to friends, neighbors, and acquaintances that she knows and who want to support her in her work. Ever since she was a small child she had an affinity for business and sales. Today she has great ability in this field thanks to her empathy and excellent customer service.

She seeks a loan to buy a supply of beauty products and clothing to increase her inventory and improve her sales, resulting in good income to be able to meet her household expenses. She hopes to be able to be successful thanks to the support of the people whose good heart supports this type of project.

loans.use: to buy a supply of beauty products and clothing to increase her inventory.

loans.name: Susana Gertrudis

texts.es:
Susana de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta 8ª grado, esta acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura y la pesca tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 viven con ellos y están estudiando.
 
Susana trabaja como empleada domestica y lo a hecho desde hace 15 años, ademas a trabajado en la compra y venta de marisco y lo aprendió de su madre se traslada 1kilometros en bus para llegar a su trabajo y lo hace de 7: 00 am a 5: 00 pm vende y regresa a su casa para hacer los oficio de su casa y atender a su familia.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es  para comprar laminas ya que el techo de su casa esta dañado.


Los sueños de Susana son tener una mejor vivienda a la que hoy tiene, tener una tienda de productos de primera de necesidad para ya no salir de su casa, confiá en Dios que lo hará posible.
texts.en:
32-year-old Susana studied until eighth grade. She lives with her common-law spouse, and her husband works in agriculture and fishing. She has three children, of which two live with them and are studying. 

Susana works as a housekeeper, and has done this for 15 years. In addition she has worked in the buying and selling of shellfish, she learned that from her mother. She travels 1 kilometer on bus to be able to arrive at her job, and she works from 7 am until 5 pm selling, and returns to her house to begin the household chores and look after her family. 
 
The loan that she is asking for is to buy sheets of metal because the roof of her house is damaged.

Susana's dreams are to have a better house than she has today, to have a store for basic goods in order not to have to leave her house anymore. She believes in God that he will make it possible.

loans.use: to buy sheets of metal because the roof of her house is damaged

loans.name: Nua Ngam 3 Group

texts.en:
Toan is a Thai lady who lives in a small Thai traditional house with her husband, her 13-year-old daughter and her 10-year-old son. Her family's income mainly relies on agricultural production such as cultivating rice, cassava, corn, peanut, and raising pigs, chickens, ducks, buffalo. 

Toan is a very hard-working person who continuously expands farming and breeding to improve living conditions. Indeed, she has taken the second loan in Anh Chi Em Program to buy pigs after her success in raising and selling pigs from the first loan and the training she received in the program. She said that the most useful knowledge she learnt from Anh Chi Em is that she should not let the pigs wander but keep them in captivity to avoid diseases. 

Toan believes her investment will be good and help her family be more abundant, and she will be able to afford to buy more new furniture for the house. She hopes that her children will continue studying well, then they will get in a well-known university and have a good job, good income and an abundant life. In the picture, Toan stands first from the right.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more cows and sell cow's meat at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Quiere Al Niño Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Quiere Al Niño” y está conformado por 07 socios emprendedores y responsables. Delia de 56 años de edad es casada con 05 hijos independientes. Delia es ama de casa, lo cual se dedica al cuidado de los niños. Su mayor sueño es contar una tienda de abarrotes. Es Por Ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de arroz, papa y azúcar. Gracias a su esfuerzo ha logrado mejorar su calidad de vida. El grupo “Quiere Al Niño” Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por hacer posible este crédito. Delia se encuentra de pie en la parte posterior, es la primera del lado derecho y viste chaleco negro.
texts.en:
This is the "Quiere al Niño" ["Love the Child"] group and is made up of 7 entrepreneurial and responsible members. 

Delia is 56 years old, married, and has 5 independent children. Delia is a housewife, and devotes herself to the care of the children. Her greatest dream is to have a grocery store. That is why she requested a loan for the purchase of rice, potatoes and sugar. Thanks to her efforts she has managed to improve her quality of life. 

The "Quiere al Niño" group wants to thank Kiva lenders for making this loan possible. Delia is standing in the back, is the first on the right and wears a black vest.

loans.use: to buy rice, potatoes and sugar.

loans.name: Derlys Del Carmen

texts.es:
Derlys es una bella mujer de 37 años de edad, madre de un hijo de 7 años criada con las buenas costumbres pueblerinas, desde el colegio desarrollo una gran pasión por todo lo relacionado con el salón de belleza  y desde que salió comenzó a realizar cursos.

Inicio su etapa en salones de belleza hasta que un día se aventuró y decidió ir en busca de su propia clientela montando un negocio en su hogar. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido pues también quiere vender productos para complementar sus servicios, como crema de manos, gel, productos capilares, tinturas para cabello, barnice y cambiar su equipo mejorando su plancha para cabello, secador e instrumentos como máquina para motilar, cepillos, peines, entre otros.

El crédito para ella será muy importante pues terminara de consolidar su empresa completándola con todos los insumos necesarios para operar y ofrecer cualquier servicio que lleguen a solicitarle.

Su sueño es que su empresa progrese y tenga muchos clientes ya que será determinante porque dejo su hogar para aventurarse en la ciudad buscando un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Derlys is lovely 37-year-old woman, the mother of a seven-year-old son, and was herself raised with the strong values of her community. She developed a great passion for anything to do with beauty salons when she was in high school and later took cosmetology courses. Derlys started her career working in beauty salons until one day she took a risk and decided to start seeking her own clients and opened a salon in her home.  

She is applying for a loan for the purchase of goods that she can sell in addition to offering her services: hand creams, gel, shampoos, conditions, and hair dyes, and nail polish. She will also upgrade some of her equipment, including a curling iron, dryer, an electric hair trimmer, combs, and brushes.

This loan will be critical to Derlys as she'll have her salon properly stocked and equipped with all of the supplies she'll need to run the salon and offer her clients any service they ask for. 

Derlys' ambition is that her business will continue to grow and that she'll have many clients. This success will be the fulfillment of what she started when she left home for the city to seek a brighter future.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products such as hand cream, gel, hair products and dyes, and nail polish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more crates of drinks wholesale

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es:
Orlando de 49 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, ya que sus padres no creían en el estudio y solo  lo envían a trabajar, esta casado y su esposa se dedica a atender un molino de maíz que tenia. Los tres hijos están casados.

Orlando se dedica a administrar una hacienda en su localidad desde hace 7 años, ademas trabaja en la agricultura y lo aprendió por medio de sus padres desde que era un niño le traslada 2 kilómetros en bicicleta hasta llegar a su trabajo y lo hace desde las 6:00 am a las 5:00 pm donde regresa a su casa a colaborar en los oficios domésticos.


El  préstamo que esta solicitando, es para los gastos de graduación de una nieta quien esta en kinder y la quiere mucho.


Los sueños de Orlando son tener ganado de repasto para que pueda tener otros ingresos económicos aparte de su trabajo como administrador.
texts.en:
Orlando is 49 years old. He never had the opportunity to go to school, since his parents did not believe in studying and only sent him to work. He is married and with his wife he tends to corn mill he has. All three of his children are married. 

Orlando has earned a living over the past 7 years by managing a farm in his area. He also works in agriculture, and he learned this from his parents since he was a child. He commutes 2 kilometers by bicycle to get to work which he does from 6:00AM to 5:00PM. This is when he returns home to help with the household chores.

The loan he is requesting is for graduation expenses for his granddaughter who is in Kindergarden and whom he loves very much. Orlando dreams of having cows on pastures so that he can earn more money apart from his work as a manager.

loans.use: to pay for his granddaughter's Kindergarten graduation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Lubis Mar

texts.es:
Lubis, de 31 años, inicio con un negocio de alquiler de lavadoras hace aproximadamente 4 años con el afán de buscar una actividad que le generara ingresos para poder sobrevivir con su hijo y su esposo.

En el momento en nació su hijo, encontró su motivación para trabajar incansablemente y así ofrecerle lo mejor para su vida y desarrollo.

Hoy en día su hijo tiene 5 años y se ha convertido en la alegría de esta mujer trabajadora.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una lavadora nueva que le permita mantener su servicio disponible y mucho más eficiente, de esta manera poder llevar el sustento para su hogar.

Con este préstamo podrá sostener  a su hijo y a su esposo brindándoles una calidad de vida mejor.

Apoya a Lubis para que pueda continuar con su actividad!
texts.en:
Lubis is 31 years old. About 4 years ago she started a washing machine rental business in the hopes of finding an activity that would generate an income so that she would be able to survive with her son and her husband.

Since the moment she was born, she has had a strong motivation to work tirelessly and this has provided the best in her life and development.

Today, her son is 5 years old and has become this hard-working woman's light in life.

She is seeking a loan so that she can buy a new washing machine so that she can keep her services available and more efficient.  This is how she supports her household.

With this loan she will be able to support her son and her husband, providing them with a better quality of life.

Please support Lubis so that she can continue running her business!

loans.use: to buy a new washing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies in order to maintain his cocoa crops.

loans.name: Davlatoy

texts.ru:
Эту женщину в возрасте зовут Давлатой. Ей 53 года. Она из сельской местности района Яван. Давлатой замужем за трудового мигранта. Ее муж и один сын постоянно ездят в Россию на заработки. Давлатой живет в районе с дочерью, вторым сыном и невесткой. Дочь школьница, невестка швея, а сын помогает матери в ее животноводческом бизнесе. Давлатой выращивает крупнорогатый скот мясной и молочной породы, а также мелкорогатый скот. Она начала эту деятельность 8 лет назад. Ей нравится доить коров, ухаживать за скотами и получать за счет них хорошую прибыль. 
В настоящий момент целью запрашиваемого кредита Давлатой является купля скота и корма для них. За счет их прибыли в будущем она хочет женить своего второго сына. Давлатой надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
This woman is named Davlatoy. She is 53 and lives in a rural area of the Yavan region. She is married to a working migrant who has gone to work in Russia with one of their sons. She lives with her daughter, her second son and his wife. Her daughter is in school, her daughter-in-law is a seamstress and her son helps his mother with her animal husbandry business, raising cattle and small livestock for milk and meat. She started this business eight years ago.

Davlatoy likes to milk her cows and care for the animals and receives a good income in this way. She is currently looking for a loan to purchase livestock and feed. In the future, she wants to put profits toward her second son's marriage. She hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy livestock and feed

loans.name: Awudu

texts.en:
Awudu is an artisan from Ghana who specializes in hand-carved African masks and decor. He would like to invest in a purchase of raw materials and supplies, including wood, sand paper, stains, polish, and beads.

Awudu has been selling through NOVICA since 2010. This is his story:

"When I was a boy, I'd follow friends home after school. Their parents had a carving workshop. They noticed my interest and let me try sandpapering the carved items, then I began learning how to design and finish a piece. I had to drop out of school due to financial difficulties and I started working on my own. I was determined to make it and was able to put my siblings through school. Now my dream is to further my education and expand my workshop to be able to train more people."

"May God bless those who are helping to fund my microcredit request."

Use the link below to view Awudu's hand-carved African masks and decor on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/7784

loans.use: to purchase raw materials and supplies, including wood, sand paper, stains, polish, and beads

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is an artisan from Ghana who specializes in wood masks and leather desk sets. He would like to invest in various improvements to his workshop, including expanding the physical space and purchasing new equipment, such as a vice, an electric drill and a sander.

Francis has been selling through NOVICA since 2003. This is his story:

"I come from a family of traditional wood carvers. While at school, funding was becoming a difficulty, so during weekends and vacations, I would visit my father's workshop and assist him by carving some products for sale. The realization eventually dawned on me to stay on, work on my own designs, and display my own woodcarvings. I opened a new workshop, which my sister and a cousin manage and together we preserve the family legacy."


"Many thanks for your support, which helps us artisans improve our business and the quality of our items."

Use the link below to view Francis's wood masks and leather desk sets on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/3835

loans.use: to invest in various improvements to his workshop, including expanding the physical space and purchasing new equipment, such as a vice, an electric drill and a sander

loans.name: Gung

texts.en:
Gung is an artisan from Indonesia who specializes in handpainted wood sculptures and masks. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of wood for his designs.

Gung has been selling through NOVICA since 2003. This is his story:

"Most of my family members are carvers - carving is our family heritage. Other than carving, I also love to paint so after trying different procedures I finally found a way to combine wood carving with painting. My parents taught me that work is a must, but with good education, people will respect you even more."

"I will use the microcredit to prepare more pieces for the holiday season. I would like to express my joy and a thousand thanks to you for the support. I hope I can develop new designs soon."

Use the link below to view Gung's handpainted wood sculptures and masks on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/3888

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of wood for his designs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy work tools such as a shovel, mixer, screwdrivers, hammer, tape measure, and to market his business.

loans.name: Fortaleza De Horizontes Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FORTALEZA DE HORIZONTES” iniciará el trigésimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Victoria es la Pesidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, venta de tucumanas, tienda de cereales, artesanía en goma eva, venta de perfumes, venta de calzados, venta de verduras.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Victoria es integrante, ella indica que hace quince años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitar a su domicilio. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de verduras; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de un trabajo anterior, donde trabajada de empleada, con un poco de ahorros decide abrir su negocio independiente. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de verduras por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el consultorio, las capacitaciones y el crédito que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank group "Fortaleza de Horizontes" will soon begin its thirtieth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as a part of the Central Focus of Santiago II. This group is made up of eight members and lead by a board of directors, of which Victoria is the president. The businesses that the members run are diverse and include food sales, sale of tucumanas (a Bolivian dish), stores selling cereals, perfume sales, artisanal handicrafts, shoe stores, and vegetable sales.

The loan that Victoria is requesting will help the small business owners in her group. Victoria has been a member of Pro Mujer for 15 years. She joined at the invitation of an employee of the institution that came to visit her in her home. Currently, she runs a business selling vegetables. Victoria learned to run this business in a job that she held prior to opening her own business. With some savings, she was able to start an independent business. 

The loan that Victoria is requesting will help her to increase her capital (buying vegetables in bulk). She will buy them from sellers in the city of La Paz  then sell them in her business. This work allows her to generate resources to support her family financially. She is married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Victoria responds that she likes the trainings, guidance, and loans that the institution offers.
