loans.use: to buy vegetables in bulk.

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric is a Ghanaian artisan who specializes in African masks and drums. He would like to invest in a purchase of raw materials, including wood, polish, stains, and goat hide for the drum heads.

Eric has been selling through NOVICA since 2000. This is his story:

"During school summer holidays, I would visit my brother, who taught me how to carve. With help from my family, especially my brother, I was able to open my own workshop in the town where I grew up. Sese, a common wood harvested in eastern Ghana, is my primary material. Masks and profiles comprise the majority of my art. My inspiration comes naturally, although sometimes I carve based on my customers' ideas.

"I am very thankful, as this microcredit helps ensure that I am kept in business. Without your support I may have folded up by now. I am very grateful to you all."

Use the link below to view Eric's African masks and drums on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/2275

loans.use: to invest in a purchase of raw materials, including wood, polish, stains, and goat hide for the drum heads

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
Cesar es un joven muy responsable y trabajador, siempre dedicado a su familia, tiene 23 años y vive en San Martin junto a su familia. Desde que era un adolescente ha apoyado a sus padres en la chacra y es por ello que le nació ese amor y la pasión por cultivar diversos productos. Actualmente se está dedicando al cultivo de arroz, más adelante quiere innovar con otras plantas, él se esfuerza mucho cada día porque quiere ofrecer excelentes productos a sus clientes.
Cesar quiere utilizar este crédito para poder realizar el mantenimiento de sus cultivos y así pueda obtener una excelente cosecha. Él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva por su generosidad, más adelante espera ampliar sus plantaciones y poder plantar otros productos.
texts.en:
Cesar is a responsible, hard-working young man who is devoted to his family. He is 23 years old and lives in San Martin along with his family. Ever since  he reached adolescence, he's helped his parents on the farm, which is where his love and his passion for growing a variety of crops was born. He is currently primarily engaged in cultivating rice, but later on he'd like to try innovating with other plants. He exerts himself every day because he wants to provide his customers with excellent products.

Cesar wants to use this loan to see his cultivation through and get an excellent harvest from it. He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for their generosity. His future plans are to expand his farm and be able to plant other crops.

loans.use: maintain his rice crop

loans.name: Margarita Maria

texts.es:
Margarita es la dueña de un verdadero paraíso verde, unos terrenos poblados de verduras que tantos hogares disfrutan cada día gracias a esos campesinos que trabajan diariamente entre 12 y 15 horas.
Margarita aparte es madre de 4 hijos y tiene esposo es una mujer que la verdad no tiene tiempo para ella pues es entrega totalmente a sus hijos y a su trabajo.
Un campesino para poder tener utilidad de sus terrenos debe esperar la cosecha por tal razón Margarita solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos para mantener sus cultivos como lo son abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas, fungicidas y estos tienen un alto costo, ella se compromete a pagarlos muy puntualmente, solo quieren que le ayuden a mantener ese paraíso que le fue heredado por sus padres quienes le enseñaron todo lo que sabe.
texts.en:
Margarita is the owner of a green paradise - fields filled with vegetables that many households enjoy every day thanks to farmers that work between 12 and 15 hours daily.

Margarita is a mother of 4 children and she has a husband.  She is truly a woman that doesn't take time for herself. She dedicates herself completely to her children and her work.

For farmers to be able maintain the land, they have to wait for income that they receive after the harvest in order to buy supplies. This is why Margarita is seeking a loan. She doesn't have the capital yet to pay for the supplies she needs to work the land. With this loan, she will buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides, and fungicides. These things cost a lot of money. She promises to repay the loan punctually. She simply wants to maintain this paradise that she inherited from her parents, who taught her everything she knows.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fertilizers, manure, pesticides, and fungicides.

loans.name: Umut

texts.ru: Умут, 44 года, замужем, многодетная мать 3 детей. Умут в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи с 1994 года занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Умут в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 10 коров, 5 лошадей и 50 овец. Ее развитое хозяйство приносит ежемесячную прибыль около 17,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Умут обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 7 ягнят и 3 телят для разведения. Доходы от кредита Умут вложит в расширение бизнеса и она хочет дать достойное образование ее детям.
texts.en: Umut is 44 years old, married and the mother of three children.  She has been involved in animal husbandry since 1994, and this activity constitutes her family's main source of income.  Thanks to her very hard work, she now owns ten cows, five horses and 50 sheep.  Her farming business brings her a monthly income of about 17,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Umut has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to buy seven lambs and three calves for breeding.  She plans to reinvest the earnings from her loan into further expanding her business.  She also wants to give a decent education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase seven lambs and three cows in order to invest in her business, increase her profits, and pay for her children's education.

loans.name: María Renee

texts.es:
María Renee, nació en Yacuiba una provincia ubicada en el departamento de Tarija – Bolivia y es la menor de cuatro hermanos. Ella nos comenta que cuando tenía 15 años se casó y tuvo una hija, pero luego al pasar un tiempo se divorció y se fue a Argentina, lugar en donde vivió por más de 30 años teniendo trabajos eventuales cuyos ingresos solo cubrían los gastos del hogar, por lo que no pudo estudiar. Posteriormente al enterarse de que su mamá que tiene 90 años se encontraba delicada de salud y necesitaba muchos cuidados y medicamentos, decidió regresar a Bolivia y empezó a trabajar en una empresa de seguros de viajes y por las noches estudia la carrera de Ingeniería Comercial. 
Los ingresos que actualmente percibe María Renee solo le alcanzan para los gastos del hogar por lo que solicita un crédito educativo para lograr culminar sus estudios y así cumplir su más grande sueño que es poderse titular y abrir su propia consultora en comercio exterior, ya que considera que esto le permitirá tener una estabilidad económica para continuar ayudando a su mamá y apoyar a su hija cuando lo necesite.

María Renee de antemano agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos ayudan a otros y generan nuevas oportunidades de crecimiento, así como a ella se le están otorgando ahora.
texts.en:
María Renee was born in Yacuiba, a province located in the department of Tarija, Bolivia. She is the youngest of four siblings. When she was fifteen years old, she got married and had a daughter. Some time later, she got divorced and moved to Argentina, where she lived for more than 30 years. During this time, she was working sporadic jobs whose income only covered her household expenses, so she could never go to school.  When she found out her mother, who was 90 years old, was in poor health and needed a lot of care and medicine, she decided to return to Bolivia. She began to work for a company selling trip insurance and take classes at night in Business Engineering.
María Renee's current income only covers her household needs, which is why she is seeking this student loan to finish her studies and achieve her greater dream of having a diploma and opening her own consulting firm on foreign business. She concludes that this will provide the economic stability that she needs to continue helping her mother and at the same time supporting her daughter as needed.

María Renee would like to thank in advance all the people who, through their own economic resources, help others and generate new opportunities for growth, such as the one she is seeking now.

loans.use: pay for her studies in Business Engineering
